Jan Tucker, one of the world's most sought after private detectives, investigates the illegal activities of a wealthy businessman named John McCallister.

conversation.text: I would recommend "The 13th Warrior". It is a historical drama based on a novel by John Jakes. Overall, "The 13th Warrior" is a captivating historical drama that offers a unique insight into the Wars of Scottish Independence and the human spirit that shines through in even the darkest of times.
